caption.p: Scanning electron microscope (SEM) images of cathode films with different slurry pH values and different thicknesses: ( a) pH = 12.1, 240 µm; ( b) pH = 12.0, 130 µm; ( c) pH = 10.8, 189 µm; ( d) pH = 10.7, 82 µm. The craters on the electrode surface with different diameters are marked with red dot lines.
